name: 鄭以旋
objective: This course teaches Electrical Engineering and Computer Sciences students. The four English skills (reading, listening, writing and speaking) will be taught in an integrated manner.
schedule:
Schedule:

Week 1 – Introduction
Week 2 – Holiday
Week 7 - Holiday
Week 9 – School mid-term (no class)
Week 13 – Speaking test
Week 14 – Speaking test
Week 15 – Final Exam
Week 17 - Holiday
Week 18 – Consultation (no class)

All other weeks:
1.	Read 1 to 2 units from the textbook(s). Students will pick the units. 
2.	Read 1 to 2 latest news article(s) on engineering.
3.	Listen to a recording/podcast/video on engineering.
4.	Engage in discussions on topics covered in the readings and/or listening exercises.
scorePolicy:
Evaluation:

Writing test				15%
School mid-term			20%
Speaking test				15%
Final Exam				40%
Participation and attendance		10%
materials:
Career Paths Computer Engineering, Express Publishing
Career Paths Electrical Engineering, Express Publishing
consultation: Students may make consultation appointments during office hours with the lecturer in advance by email.
remarks: Online courses will be conducted here - https://meet.google.com/ecz-jamj-ozu.
